messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, thanks for taking my call. I'm feeling really stressed out right now because I've recently had some financial troubles, and I need to cancel or return all the orders I have with your store. I just want to get everything sorted out as soon as possible. Can you help me with that?

I just want to get everything sorted out as soon as possible. Can you help me with that?
